verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

זֹ֤את <WH2063> likewise תִּֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> become תּוֹרַ֣ת <WH8451> This shall be the law הַמְּצֹרָ֔ע <WH6879> of the leper בְּי֖וֹם <WH3117> in the day טָהֳרָת֑וֹ <WH2893> of his cleansing וְהוּבָ֖א <WH935> He shall be brought אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> unto the priest

וְיָצָא֙ <WH3318> shall go forth הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> And the priest אֶל־ <WH413> about מִח֖וּץ <WH2351> out לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> of the camp וְרָאָה֙ <WH7200> shall look הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> and the priest וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> and if נִרְפָּ֥א <WH7495> be healed נֶֽגַע־ <WH5061> and behold [if] the plague הַצָּרַ֖עַת <WH6883> of leprosy מִן־ <WH4480> in הַצָּרֽוּעַ׃ <WH6879> in the leper

וְצִוָּה֙ <WH6680> command הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> Then shall the priest וְלָקַ֧ח <WH3947> to take לַמִּטַּהֵ֛ר <WH2891> for him that is to be cleansed שְׁתֵּֽי־ <WH8147> two צִפֳּרִ֥ים <WH6833> birds חַיּ֖וֹת <WH2416> alive טְהֹר֑וֹת <WH2889> [and] clean וְעֵ֣ץ <WH6086> wood אֶ֔רֶז <WH730> and cedar וּשְׁנִ֥י <WH8144> scarlet תוֹלַ֖עַת <WH8438> oppressor וְאֵזֹֽב׃ <WH231> and hyssop

וְצִוָּה֙ <WH6680> shall command הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> And the priest וְשָׁחַ֖ט <WH7819> be killed אֶת־ <WH853> הַצִּפּ֣וֹר <WH6833> of the birds הָאֶחָ֑ת <WH259> that one אֶל־ <WH413> about כְּלִי־ <WH3627> vessel חֶ֖רֶשׂ <WH2789> in an earthen עַל־ <WH5921> over מַ֥יִם <WH4325> water חַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> over running

אֶת־ <WH853> הַצִּפֹּ֤ר <WH6833> bird הַֽחַיָּה֙ <WH2416> As for the living יִקַּ֣ח <WH3947> he shall take אֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֵ֥ץ <WH6086> wood הָאֶ֛רֶז <WH730> it and the cedar וְאֶת־ <WH853> שְׁנִ֥י <WH8144> and the scarlet הַתּוֹלַ֖עַת <WH8438> oppressor וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאֵזֹ֑ב <WH231> and the hyssop וְטָבַ֨ל <WH2881> and shall dip אוֹתָ֜ם <WH853> וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> הַצִּפֹּ֣ר <WH6833> bird הַֽחַיָּ֗ה <WH2416> them and the living בְּדַם֙ <WH1818> in the blood הַצִּפֹּ֣ר <WH6833> of the bird הַשְּׁחֻטָ֔ה <WH7819> [that was] killed עַ֖ל <WH5921> over הַמַּ֥יִם <WH4325> water הַֽחַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> over the running

וְהִזָּ֗ה <WH5137> And he shall sprinkle עַ֧ל <WH5921> over הַמִּטַּהֵ֛ר <WH2891> upon him that is to be cleansed מִן־ <WH4480> from הַצָּרַ֖עַת <WH6883> from the leprosy שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> seven פְּעָמִ֑ים <WH6471> times וְטִ֣הֲר֔וֹ <WH2891> and shall pronounce him clean וְשִׁלַּ֛ח <WH7971> loose אֶת־ <WH853> הַצִּפֹּ֥ר <WH6833> bird הַֽחַיָּ֖ה <WH2416> and shall let the living עַל־ <WH5921> over פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> into the open הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> field

וְכִבֶּס֩ <WH3526> shall wash הַמִּטַּהֵ֨ר <WH2891> And he that is to be cleansed אֶת־ <WH853> בְּגָדָ֜יו <WH899> his clothes וְגִלַּ֣ח <WH1548> and shave אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all שְׂעָר֗וֹ <WH8181> off all his hair וְרָחַ֤ץ <WH7364> and wash בַּמַּ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> himself in water וְטָהֵ֔ר <WH2891> that he may be clean וְאַחַ֖ר <WH310> and after יָב֣וֹא <WH935> that he shall come אֶל־ <WH413> about הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> into the camp וְיָשַׁ֛ב <WH3427> and shall tarry מִח֥וּץ <WH2351> abroad לְאָהֳל֖וֹ <WH168> out of his tent שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> seven יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> days

וְהָיָה֩ <WH1961> become בַיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֜י <WH7637> But it shall be on the seventh יְגַלַּ֣ח <WH1548> that he shall shave אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all שְׂעָר֗וֹ <WH8181> all his hair אֶת־ <WH853> רֹאשׁ֤וֹ <WH7218> off his head וְאֶת־ <WH853> זְקָנוֹ֙ <WH2206> and his beard וְאֵת֙ <WH853> גַּבֹּ֣ת <WH1354> top עֵינָ֔יו <WH5869> affliction וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all שְׂעָר֖וֹ <WH8181> even all his hair יְגַלֵּ֑חַ <WH1548> he shall shave וְכִבֶּ֣ס <WH3526> off and he shall wash אֶת־ <WH853> בְּגָדָ֗יו <WH899> his clothes וְרָחַ֧ץ <WH7364> also he shall wash אֶת־ <WH853> בְּשָׂר֛וֹ <WH1320> his flesh בַּמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> in water וְטָהֵֽר׃ <WH2891> and he shall be clean

וּבַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁמִינִ֗י <WH8066> And on the eighth יִקַּ֤ח <WH3947> he shall take שְׁנֵֽי־ <WH8147> two כְבָשִׂים֙ <WH3532> he lambs תְּמִימִ֔ים <WH8549> without blemish וְכַבְשָׂ֥ה <WH3535> ewe lamb אַחַ֛ת <WH259> and one בַּת־ <WH1323> of the first שְׁנָתָ֖הּ <WH8141> year תְּמִימָ֑ה <WH8549> without blemish וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> and three עֶשְׂרֹנִ֗ים <WH6241> tenth deals סֹ֤לֶת <WH5560> of fine flour מִנְחָה֙ <WH4503> [for] a meat offering בְּלוּלָ֣ה <WH1101> mingled בַשֶּׁ֔מֶן <WH8081> with oil וְלֹ֥ג <WH3849> log אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> and one שָֽׁמֶן׃ <WH8081> of oil

וְהֶעֱמִ֞יד <WH5975> shall present הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <WH3548> And the priest הַֽמְטַהֵ֗ר <WH2891> that maketh [him] clean אֵ֛ת <WH853> הָאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> the man הַמִּטַּהֵ֖ר <WH2891> that is to be made clean וְאֹתָ֑ם <WH854> and the aforesaid לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> and those things before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> [at] the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

וְלָקַ֨ח <WH3947> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> And the priest אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּ֣בֶשׂ <WH3532> he lamb הָאֶחָ֗ד <WH259> one וְהִקְרִ֥יב <WH7126> and offer אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> לְאָשָׁ֖ם <WH817> him for a trespass offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> לֹ֣ג <WH3849> and the log הַשָּׁ֑מֶן <WH8081> of oil וְהֵנִ֥יף <WH5130> and wave אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> תְּנוּפָ֖ה <WH8573> them [for] a wave offering לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְשָׁחַ֣ט <WH7819> And he shall slay אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּ֗בֶשׂ <WH3532> the lamb בִּ֠מְקוֹם <WH4725> in the place אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> where יִשְׁחַ֧ט <WH7819> where he shall kill אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽחַטָּ֛את <WH2403> the sin offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> and the burnt offering בִּמְק֣וֹם <WH4725> place הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> in the holy כִּ֡י <WH3588> for כַּ֠חַטָּאת <WH2403> for as the sin offering הָאָשָׁ֥ם <WH817> [so is] the trespass offering הוּא֙ <WH1931> he לַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> [is] the priest's קֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> it [is] most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <WH6944> holy הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וְלָקַ֣ח <WH3947> shall take הַכֹּהֵן֮ <WH3548> And the priest מִדַּ֣ם <WH1818> [some] of the blood הָאָשָׁם֒ <WH817> of the trespass offering וְנָתַן֙ <WH5414> shall put הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> and the priest עַל־ <WH5921> on תְּנ֛וּךְ <WH8571> [it] upon the tip אֹ֥זֶן <WH241> ear הַמִּטַּהֵ֖ר <WH2891> of him that is to be cleansed הַיְמָנִ֑ית <WH3233> of the right וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on בֹּ֤הֶן <WH931> and upon the thumb יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> hand הַיְמָנִ֔ית <WH3233> of his right וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on בֹּ֥הֶן <WH931> and upon the great toe רַגְל֖וֹ <WH7272> foot הַיְמָנִֽית׃ <WH3233> of his right

וְלָקַ֥ח <WH3947> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> And the priest מִלֹּ֣ג <WH3849> [some] of the log הַשָּׁ֑מֶן <WH8081> of oil וְיָצַ֛ק <WH3332> and pour עַל־ <WH5921> and כַּ֥ף <WH3709> [it] into the palm הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> of his own הַשְּׂמָאלִֽית׃ <WH8042> left hand

וְטָבַ֤ל <WH2881> shall dip הַכֹּהֵן֙ <WH3548> And the priest אֶת־ <WH853> אֶצְבָּע֣וֹ <WH676> finger הַיְמָנִ֔ית <WH3233> his right מִן־ <WH4480> some הַשֶּׁ֕מֶן <WH8081> in the oil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after עַל־ <WH5921> and כַּפּ֖וֹ <WH3709> hand הַשְּׂמָאלִ֑ית <WH8042> that [is] in his left וְהִזָּ֨ה <WH5137> and shall sprinkle מִן־ <WH4480> some הַשֶּׁ֧מֶן <WH8081> of the oil בְּאֶצְבָּע֛וֹ <WH676> with his finger שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7651> seven פְּעָמִ֖ים <WH6471> times לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וּמִיֶּ֨תֶר <WH3499> And of the rest הַשֶּׁ֜מֶן <WH8081> of the oil אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is in כַּפּ֗וֹ <WH3709> that [is] in his hand יִתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> put הַכֹּהֵן֙ <WH3548> shall the priest עַל־ <WH5921> and תְּנ֞וּךְ <WH8571> upon the tip אֹ֤זֶן <WH241> ear הַמִּטַּהֵר֙ <WH2891> of him that is to be cleansed הַיְמָנִ֔ית <WH3233> of the right וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on בֹּ֤הֶן <WH931> and upon the thumb יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> hand הַיְמָנִ֔ית <WH3233> of his right וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on בֹּ֥הֶן <WH931> and upon the great toe רַגְל֖וֹ <WH7272> foot הַיְמָנִ֑ית <WH3233> of his right עַ֖ל <WH5921> on דַּ֥ם <WH1818> upon the blood הָאָשָֽׁם׃ <WH817> of the trespass offering

וְהַנּוֹתָ֗ר <WH3498> And the remnant בַּשֶּׁ֙מֶן֙ <WH8081> of the oil אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> his עַל־ <WH5921> behalf כַּ֣ף <WH3709> hand הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> that [is] in the priest's יִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> he shall pour עַל־ <WH5921> his behalf רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> upon the head הַמִּטַּהֵ֑ר <WH2891> of him that is to be cleansed וְכִפֶּ֥ר <WH3722> shall make an atonement עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> his behalf הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> and the priest לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> for him before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְעָשָׂ֤ה <WH6213> shall offer הַכֹּהֵן֙ <WH3548> And the priest אֶת־ <WH853> הַ֣חַטָּ֔את <WH2403> the sin offering וְכִפֶּ֕ר <WH3722> and make an atonement עַל־ <WH5921> the one הַמִּטַּהֵ֖ר <WH2891> for him that is to be cleansed מִטֻּמְאָת֑וֹ <WH2932> from his uncleanness וְאַחַ֖ר <WH310> and afterward יִשְׁחַ֥ט <WH7819> he shall kill אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֹלָֽה׃ <WH5930> the burnt offering

וְהֶעֱלָ֧ה <WH5927> shall offer הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> And the priest אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֹלָ֥ה <WH5930> the burnt offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> and the meat offering הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חָה <WH4196> upon the altar וְכִפֶּ֥ר <WH3722> shall make an atonement עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> and הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> and the priest וְטָהֵֽר׃ <WH2891> for him and he shall be clean ס

וְאִם־ <WH518> if דַּ֣ל <WH1800> And if he [be] poor ה֗וּא <WH1931> he וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> else יָדוֹ֮ <WH3027> and his means מַשֶּׂגֶת֒ <WH5381> are insufficient וְ֠לָקַח <WH3947> so much then he shall take כֶּ֣בֶשׂ <WH3532> lamb אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> one אָשָׁ֛ם <WH817> [for] a trespass offering לִתְנוּפָ֖ה <WH8573> to be waved לְכַפֵּ֣ר <WH3722> to make an atonement עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> and וְעִשָּׂר֨וֹן <WH6241> tenth deal סֹ֜לֶת <WH5560> of fine flour אֶחָ֨ד <WH259> for him and one בָּל֥וּל <WH1101> mingled בַּשֶּׁ֛מֶן <WH8081> with oil לְמִנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> for a meat offering וְלֹ֥ג <WH3849> and a log שָֽׁמֶן׃ <WH8081> of oil

וּשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> And two תֹרִ֗ים <WH8449> turtledoves א֤וֹ <WH176> or שְׁנֵי֙ <WH8147> or two בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> young יוֹנָ֔ה <WH3123> pigeons אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which תַּשִּׂ֖יג <WH5381> are within יָד֑וֹ <WH3027> his means וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become אֶחָד֙ <WH259> and the one חַטָּ֔את <WH2403> shall be a sin offering וְהָאֶחָ֖ד <WH259> and the other עֹלָֽה׃ <WH5930> a burnt offering

וְהֵבִ֨יא <WH935> And he shall bring אֹתָ֜ם <WH853> בַּיּ֧וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁמִינִ֛י <WH8066> them on the eighth לְטָהֳרָת֖וֹ <WH2893> for his cleansing אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <WH3548> unto the priest אֶל־ <WH413> at פֶּ֥תַח <WH6607> unto the door אֹֽהֶל־ <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> of the congregation לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD
